about_the_game:
"Yamafuda!" is an easy way to experience mountain hiking using cards. Each time you hike a mountain, you get a card to choose from. Along the way, you can create hiking gears to improve your hiking experience. When the weather on the mountain changes, so does the steepness. Enjoy the deck-building roguelike game as the scenery changes!

Features

  • 2+ characters
  • 50+ cards
  • 50+ gears
  • 10+ mountains

Story

Koharu started mountain hiking at the recommendation of a friend, and she loves it so much.


She immediately takes advantage of her vacation to challenge the distant mountains.

「I wonder how Hiyori is doing.」

she remembe Hiyori on the sky seen from the train window.


When the train arrived at the station, Hiyori's figure was more clearly visible.

「I'm here!」

The hiyori reflected in the window was an entity.

「Wow!」

Koharu was surprised.
Hiyori continued without care.


「Let's start our hike!」
「All right!」

Two people who have come to climb a mountain with just a little bit of energy.
Will they make it to the summit safely...?

It's starting!
